mapper.sql: a.money_sno AS "moneySno", a.money_time AS "moneyTime", a.money AS "money", a.money_type AS "moneyType", a.money_desc AS "moneyDesc", a.shopcard AS "shopcard", a.useful AS "useful", a.booktype AS "booktype", a.splitno AS "splitno", a.real_money AS "realMoney", a.username AS "username"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO money_detail_t( money_sno, money_time, money, money_type, money_desc, shopcard, useful, booktype, splitno, real_money, username ) VALUES ( #{moneySno}, #{moneyTime}, #{money}, #{moneyType}, #{moneyDesc}, #{shopcard}, #{useful}, #{booktype}, #{splitno}, #{realMoney}, #{username} )
mapper.update: UPDATE money_detail_t SET money_time = #{moneyTime}, money = #{money}, money_type = #{moneyType}, money_desc = #{moneyDesc}, shopcard = #{shopcard}, useful = #{useful}, booktype = #{booktype}, splitno = #{splitno}, real_money = #{realMoney}, username = #{username} WHERE money_sno = #{moneySno}
